ZDO_SimpleDescReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a local device wishing to inquire as to the simple descriptor of a remote device on a specified endpoint. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address for the simple descriptor request.
Endpoint_t endpoint
 The endpoint on the destination.

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a local device wishing to inquire as to the simple descriptor of a remote device on a specified endpoint. This command shall be unicast either to the remote device itself or to an alternative device that contains the discovery information of the remote device.
